name: King of Life
description: Sovereign of vitality, fertility, and mortal struggle.

name: Queen of Life
description: Mother of compassion, creation, and shelter.

name: Champion of Life
description: Defender of the living and vitality incarnate.

name: Priest of Life
description: Voice of renewal, fertility, and rites of spring.

name: Herald of Life
description: Bearer of birthâ€™s call and new beginnings.

name: Soldier of Life
description: Fights to preserve breath and body.

name: Weaver of Life
description: Spinner of fate and the mortal coil.

name: Mason of Life
description: Builder of homes, walls, and future.

name: Virgin of Life
description: Purity before destiny, unshaped potential.

name: King of Death
description: Monarch of silence, ruler of the end.

name: Queen of Death
description: Mother of ashes, comforter in grief.

name: Knight of Death
description: Executor of the end. Death rides with honor.

name: Magi of Death
description: Speaker to bones. Weaver of silence.

name: Herald of Death
description: Announcer of finality. Tolling the bell.

name: Soldier of Death
description: Marches for the grave, undeterred.

name: Spinner of Death
description: Unravels the threads of the living.

name: Mason of Death
description: Builder of tombs, mounds, and endings.

name: Virgin of Death
description: Untouched by life, first kiss of oblivion.

name: King of Light
description: Radiant ruler of judgment and justice.

name: Queen of Light
description: Giver of guidance, balance, and mercy.

name: Champion of Light
description: Fighter for righteousness and honor.

name: Priest of Light
description: Illuminator of the spirit. Guardian of truth.

name: Captain of Light
description: Strategist of glory and radiant cause.

name: Soldier of Light
description: Marches for justice. Wields the sun.

name: Seamstress of Light
description: Stitches harmony into destiny.

name: Builder of Light
description: Raises pillars of hope and truth.

name: Maiden of Light
description: Unclaimed and unburned, radiant becoming.

name: King of Dark
description: First of shadows. Ancestor of depth.

name: Queen of Dark
description: Womb of stars. Keeper of stillness.

name: Knight of Dark
description: Fights not for glory but silence.

name: Magi of Dark
description: Seer into void. Mystic of the unknowable.

name: Captain of Dark
description: Leads without light, walks with death.

name: Soldier of Dark
description: Shadowâ€™s blade. Loyal in the absence.

name: Weaver of Dark
description: Sews with nothing. Shapes the void.

name: Mason of Dark
description: Builder in the lightless deep.

name: Wife of Dark
description: Consort of secrets. Rooted in silence.

name: King of Shadow
description: Shrouded ruler. Illusive and real.

name: Queen of Shadow
description: Witch of dusk. Masked in shifting tones.

name: Assassin of Shadow
description: Strikes from dusk. Kills without name.

name: Magi of Shadow
description: Twister of reality. Master of in-between.

name: Knight of Shadow
description: Duels in doubt. Half-sworn.

name: Hound of Shadow
description: Beast from between. Bred to hunt gods.

name: Apprentice of Shadow
description: Learning chaos. Never whole.

name: Mistress of Shadow
description: Wields darkness in elegance.

name: Ruler of Chains
description: Master of the crippled court.

name: King of Chains
description: Bound and unbound, ruler of pain.

name: Consort of Chains
description: Companion to powerâ€™s torment.

name: Reaver of Chains
description: Bringer of chaos and destruction.

name: Knight of Chains
description: Wears the lash proudly.

name: Herald of the Dead Fires
description: Screams what the flames consumed.

name: Magi of the Dead Fires
description: Ash-born spellcaster.

name: The Cripple
description: Twisted by pain, strengthened by loss.

name: The Leper
description: Outcast but divine in decay.

name: The Fool
description: Jester at the end of worlds.

name: Lord of Wolves
description: Pack leader in the bloodstorm.

name: Hunter
description: Seeks what flees â€” war never ends.

name: Guardian of the Road
description: Defender of the way forward.

name: Guardian of the Dead
description: Keeps the fallen still.

name: Mercenary
description: Sellsword. Loyalty to coin.

name: Army Soldier
description: The faceless rank.

name: Lifeslayer
description: Killer of essence and soul.

name: Deathslayer
description: Denies death its feast.

name: Herald of War
description: Sound of steel and ruin.

name: Oponn
description: Twins of luck, mischief and fortune.

name: Obelisk
description: Silent watcher of timeâ€™s path.

name: Crown
description: Burden of rule, symbol of dominion.

name: Sceptre
description: Instrument of rule and force.

name: Orb
description: Mystic focus of global will.

name: Throne
description: The seat of judgment.

name: Chain
description: It binds, it chokes, it holds.

name: Master of the Deck
description: He who draws, he who chooses.

name: Salvation
description: The mercy we do not deserve.

name: The Apocalyptic
description: Bringer of endings, cleanser of the world.

name: The Shaved Knuckle in the Hole
description: The last gamble. The wild play.
